plot outline: A young Bhagwan participates in one of the freedom struggle with his father after many years he leaves his house to work with a Panwala where he falls for Muslim girl but she suddenly disappears leaving message to go back home and become something on his own. Bhagwan across Baburao a Pehlwan in Akhada who does action in small budget films this starts his journey into films where he starts getting work as a hero in films and becomes a big name in low budget films.He also takes up direction and achieves success in making small films but decides to take a big leap by making a big film like Albela and mortgages everything for the film.While he has Chandhubhai Mehta a film distributor on his way of success.
title: Ekk Albela
plot: The journey of Bhagwan Dada. A common man who rose to the top and became a legend in Indian Cinema.

A young Bhagwan participates in one of the freedom struggle with his father after many years he leaves his house to work with a Panwala where he falls for Muslim girl but she suddenly disappears leaving message to go back home and become something on his own. Bhagwan across Baburao a Pehlwan in Akhada who does action in small budget films this starts his journey into films where he starts getting work as a hero in films and becomes a big name in low budget films.He also takes up direction and achieves success in making small films but decides to take a big leap by making a big film like Albela and mortgages everything for the film.While he has Chandhubhai Mehta a film distributor on his way of success.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
